amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enforce the directive of allowing chaplains to perform same-sex marriages on Navy bases regardless of any applicable State law requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 77 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement the curriculum of the Chaplain Corps Tier 1 DATD repeal training dated April 11, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 184 (Roll no. 528).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huelskamp amendment (A068) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 184 (Roll no. 528).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A068) offered by Mr. Huelskamp.
